did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President, Office Administrative Files
1904-1915
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 9,600 items.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.)

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.472 I, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Archival transfer from the Office of the President, 1947 March 4, 1947 May 7.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Archival transfer, Office of the President, 1981 January 12. Originally accessioned as MSS 2636-b, 1947 November 15. Blueprints transferred to RG-31/2/18.811 and RG-31/2/22.811.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files (ca. 9,600 items) constitute the major record series generated by Edwin Anderson Alderman, the first president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
